google_play_reviews.content: Please add the front flash light to the system. Thanks.
Awesome, way better than anything else The brightness circle doesn't work tho
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for this feedback. I am glad that you find this app useful and enjoy it. Please contact me via e-mail so that we can troubleshot the brightness circle.

google_play_reviews.content: This is very nice app. Unfortunately not able to adjust Google Pixel 4a 5G flash intensity just the screen brightness. Maybe in the future.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for this feedback. I am glad that you find this app useful and enjoy it. Unfortunately it is not possible to adjust the flash intensity as far as I know.

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome work no ads thanks buddy ☺️
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thanks for your feedback. I am glad that you enjoy it.

google_play_reviews.content: Simple, Ad free, no creepy permissions... Works Great. Only this missing is a widget.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thank you so much for your kind words. We will try to add a widget next year.
